title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 462.2 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 462.2 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations
(a) These
regulations provide procedures for implementation by the Power Authority of the
provisions of the Personal Privacy Protection Law relating to requests for
records or personal information by data subjects. (Article 6-A of the Public

Officers Law.)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

462.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
